name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Geo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

storytitle: Jagged Stone: Mask of Solitude Basalt
storytext: "He knew right from wrong, and he never missed his mark."
